column.name: description
column.value: My GPA for this semester is 3.85 and I would like to know if I am eligible for state scholarship next semester. What are the requirements and when is the application deadline? Also, can I apply if I already receive a merit-based scholarship from the university?

column.name: message
column.value: I have reviewed your academic record. The issue is that you took Data Structures course in Fall 2022, but the prerequisite policy was updated in Spring 2023. You also need to complete Discrete Mathematics. Please provide your Discrete Math grade transcript.

column.name: message
column.value: Thank you for clarification! I completed Discrete Mathematics last semester with grade B+. I will upload the grade report to the portal. Is there anything else I need to provide?

column.name: message
column.value: Perfect! I can see your Discrete Math grade now. I will manually override the registration block. You should be able to register for Advanced Algorithms within 24 hours. Please try again tomorrow and let me know if you still have issues.

column.name: message
column.value: Hello Bekzat! To be eligible for state scholarship, you need minimum GPA of 3.50, which you have exceeded. The application period is from January 10-20, 2025. You can apply even if you have university scholarship - they are not mutually exclusive. Please prepare: transcript, recommendation letter from your advisor, and motivation essay.
